mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin(admin_email, admin_pw, admin_name, admin_phone_number, admin_birth) VALUES (#{adminEmail}, #{adminPw}, #{adminName}, #{adminPhoneNumber}, #{adminBirth})
mapper.select: SELECT id, admin_email, admin_pw, admin_name, admin_birth, admin_phone_number FROM admin WHERE admin_email = #{adminEmail} AND admin_pw = #{adminPw}
SELECT c.category_name, i.item_image, i.item_name, i.item_option, i.item_price FROM items as i INNER JOIN category as c ON c.id = i.category WHERE i.admin_id = #{adminId};

SELECT c.category_name, i.item_image, i.item_name, i.item_option, i.item_price, i.item_info, i.item_count FROM items AS i INNER JOIN category AS c ON i.category = c.id WHERE i.id = #{itemId} and i.admin_id = #{adminId};

SELECT o.order_number, o.order_date, c.category_name, o.admin_id, i.item_name, i.item_option, o.item_price, o.item_count, o.user_id, o.item_discount, o.item_total_price, o.status, o.tracking_number FROM orders as o INNER JOIN items as i ON i.id = o.item_id INNER JOIN category as c ON c.id = i.category WHERE o.admin_id = #{adminId}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, tracking_number = #{trackingNumber} WHERE id = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND order_number = #{orderNumber} AND item_id = #{itemId}) as s);
